title: marcotheminer
author: marcotheminer
content: Could this be a new board for us to discuss the happenings of lending/long-term offers?

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This board 'meta' is about discussing what is related to the forum like improvement, suggestion about this forum. If you want to borrow or lend, go to lending. But you do not have the qualifications that can make anyone give you loan.

comments.author: LeGaulois
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on August 06, 2022, 03:53:07 PM. He didn't asked you to explain what the board Meta is used for.He didn't asked where to post if he wants to lend or borrow.2 sentences totally out of topic and the 3rd isn't betterWho're you to say he doesn't have the qualification?go out, it's sunny

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on August 06, 2022, 03:53:07 PMThis board 'meta' is about discussing what is related to the forum like improvement, suggestion about this forum. OP is suggesting for new board to be added on the Lending section which is for discussion purposes only.Quote from: _act_ on August 06, 2022, 03:53:07 PMIf you want to borrow or lend, go to lending. But you do not have the qualifications that can make anyone give you loan. If you know the OP, you'll probably know that he already this information and a quick check on his post history will let you know that he knows where the lending section is. Also, OP is more capable and qualified for loan based from his history and trust. Anyways, It would be great if OP will be able to provide more information for his suggestion about Lending Discussion board as I can only think of a few topic about loans. Also, there are only few activities on the Lending Section for another board to be added.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: The reputation board seems like an appropriate one to discuss happenings of lending (and Its child board).Thinking of what discussions could come off from a lending topic, I assume they should be user focused; fitting in reputation, or scam related, which can be posted in the scam accusation board.
